::: Transanulas leaned over the new form. Now that Hell Beast was gone, he 
could escape with his new partner in crime. He choose the form of his new 
buddy. A giant turtle. :::

::: Marine ::: So we go now?

::: Transanulas slapped his head. The new form was very....stupid. But, he 
was well armed. ::: Yes, just blast those doors.

::: Marine was well armed, he made Rampage and tankkor look like toys. With a 
quick blast, the doors blew apart and they left the base. :::
